parameter.name: bar
parameter.help: This is a reference to its basetabsbar.

parameter.name: barclass
parameter.help: Class to instantiate to contain tab items. Default is 'basetabsbar'.

parameter.name: bordersize
parameter.help: The size of the border surrounding a basetabpane. Default is 0.

parameter.name: content
parameter.help: This is a reference to basetab's content area. This is where all basetabpanes in tabs are placed.

parameter.name: contentclass
parameter.help: Class to instantiate to contain basetabpanes.

parameter.name: inset_bottom
parameter.help: The bottom inset for content appearing within a basetabpane. Default is 8.

parameter.name: inset_left
parameter.help: The left inset for content appearing within a basetabpane. Default is 8.

parameter.name: inset_right
parameter.help: The right inset for content appearing within a basetabpane. Default is 8.

parameter.name: inset_top
parameter.help: The top inset for content appearing within a basetabpane. Default is 8.

parameter.name: tabclass
parameter.help: Class to instantiate tab items for basetabsbar. Can be overridden by basetabpane. Default is 'basetab'.
